titleStmt.title: The Baiting of the tyger, or, A True relation of a bloody rencounter that lately happen'd between a foreign cat and four great English dogs at the Cockpit Royal near St. James Park, in the presence of several dukes, lords, knights, ladies, squires and cits together with a particular relation how the first dog was slain and the rest dangerously wounded : set forth in a piece of doggrel for the benefit and satisfaction of the publick.

The Baiting of the tyger, or, A True relation of a bloody rencounter that lately happen'd between a foreign cat and four great English dogs at the Cockpit Royal near St. James Park, in the presence of several dukes, lords, knights, ladies, squires and cits together with a particular relation how the first dog was slain and the rest dangerously wounded : set forth in a piece of doggrel for the benefit and satisfaction of the publick.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
